attributes.action: Keep the Lloyds the only bank in Immingham open
attributes.additional_details: Every town needs a bank for obviously reasons we should not have to travel just to access basic banking services
attributes.background: Immingham is a small town that has been left with only one back Lloyds they have announced closure if the Immingham branch in November 2022 which will leave the town with no bank affecting residents community groups and charities in a negative way we need this bank to stay open

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about bank closures are a matter for individual banks, not the UK Government or Parliament.
